Player History
Drafted in 7th round, 102nd overall pick, by Houston in 2020...
Was claimed off waivers by Colorado on 4/17/2020.
Injured on 8/20/2020 with a Bruised Finger, out for 2 days...
Had first career hit on 4/26/2021, off Louis Rickman (ATL)...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Philadelphia on 7/28/2021...
Hit first career homerun on 8/1/2021, off Thomas Svoboda (STL)...
Injured on 4/3/2023 with a Bruised Wrist, out for one week...
Won Gold Glove at Rightfield in 2023...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/17/2024, hitting .462 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
Had 20-game hitting streak snapped on 4/23/2024...
Injured on 5/30/2024 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Was selected to the 2024 Allstar game...
Injured on 9/30/2024 with a Stiff Knee, out for one week...
1/31/2025: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,907,143 through salary arbitration...
